summary: This document is a series of emails from July 1, 2020, between federal prosecutors and FBI agents discussing the preparation of search warrants for Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest and the search of a residence. It includes investigative details linking Maxwell to Scott Borgerson and a shared address in Manchester, MA.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary subject of the investigation and planned arrest; search warrants are being prepared for her seizure from a third-party residence.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Publicly reported as Maxwell's boyfriend or former boyfriend; shares a joint bank account and home address with her.

persons.name: Amanda
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who would take the lead in drafting search warrants related to seizing Maxwell from a third-party premises.

persons.name: Judge Johnstone
persons.context: The judge who would swear out the search warrant; her availability and cut-off times for warrant materials are discussed.

persons.name: Vince
persons.context: An FBI agent (likely from the Boston Field Office) who forwarded information about Maxwell and Borgerson to the U.S. Attorney's Office in New Hampshire.

connections.description: Publicly reported as boyfriend and girlfriend; they have a shared joint bank account since approximately October 2018 and a shared home address.
Bank and Accurint records show them sharing a home address at 301 Summer Street, Manchester, MA; Amazon packages were delivered to either until March 2020.
M expects Amanda to take the lead in drafting search warrants for seizing Maxwell from a third-party premises.
M is coordinating with the U.S. Attorney in New Hampshire to alert Judge Johnstone about the potential need for a search warrant and her availability.

events.title: Coordination for Maxwell Search Warrant
events.description: Federal prosecutors and FBI agents exchange emails to prepare search warrants for Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest and the search of a residence, discussing legal requirements and judge availability.

events.title: Maxwell and Borgerson Joint Account Opened
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell and Scott Borgerson opened a shared joint bank account, as indicated by bank records.

events.title: Last Amazon Delivery to Shared Address
events.description: Amazon records show packages were delivered to either Ghislaine Maxwell or Scott Borgerson at 301 Summer Street, Manchester, MA, up until March 2020.

events.title: Borgerson's Purchases in New Hampshire
events.description: Scott Borgerson's bank records show multiple purchases at various locations between Hooksett and Newbury, New Hampshire.

keyFacts: Investigators were actively preparing search warrants for Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest and the search of a residence as of July 1, 2020.
Ghislaine Maxwell and Scott Borgerson were publicly reported as being in a romantic relationship and shared a joint bank account since approximately October 2018.
Maxwell and Borgerson shared a home address at 301 Summer Street, Manchester, MA, with evidence of package deliveries there until March 2020.
Prosecutors cited the legal precedent United States v. Young (1st Cir. 2016) regarding the need for a separate search warrant when seizing a suspect from a third-party residence.
The FBI was working to pinpoint the specific building where Maxwell's phone was located to target the search warrant.
